# isFunction

> Test if a value is a function.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var isFunction = require( '@stdlib/assert/is-function' );
```

#### isFunction( value )

Tests if a `value` is a `function`.

``` javascript
function beep() {
    console.log( 'beep' );
}

var bool = isFunction( beep );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

``` javascript
var isFunction = require( '@stdlib/assert/is-function' );

var bool = isFunction( function foo() {} );
// returns true

bool = isFunction( 'beep' );
// returns false

bool = isFunction( 5 );
// returns false

bool = isFunction( true );
// returns false

bool = isFunction( null );
// returns false

bool = isFunction( [] );
// returns false

bool = isFunction( {} );
// returns false
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
